## aspectCorrectedUV variable

Takes `pos`<!-- -->, a screen coord (e.g. gl\_FragCoord) and viewport resolution `res`<!-- -->, returns aspect corrected uv, with uv.y in \[-1..1\] interval.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
aspectCorrectedUV: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn2<"vec2", "vec2", "vec2">
```
